title: Virtual Assistant for Marketing Agency
job_overview:
We’re looking for a proactive Virtual Assistant for our marketing agency to support us with a range of digital and administrative tasks. Your main focus will be managing our CRM, organising and updating email templates, and supporting our project workflows. Experience in email marketing tools is a big plus

Requirements:

- Strong written and spoken English - you’ll be working with marketing copy and client assets

- Tech-savvy with basic knowledge of email marketing tools 

- Fast learner, detail-oriented, and self-organized

- Comfortable managing tasks with tools like Figma, Trello, Notion, or Asana

- Reliable internet connection and ability to work during PH daytime or partial UK hours

I want to see examples of good recent work you have done and resume, especially aroudn copywriting and email design. Please do not write a long cover letter.
